typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Building_sqnr as integer,
		Category_sqnr as integer,
		Load_date_timestamp as timestamp,
		Record_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LinkBuildingDetails
source(output(
		Building_sqnr as integer,
		Category_sqnr as integer,
		Load_date_timestamp as timestamp,
		End_date_timestamp as timestamp,
		Record_source as string,
		Construction_cost_m2 as double,
		Demolish_cost_m2 as double,
		Buyout_cost_m2 as double,
		Sell_price_m2 as double,
		Parking_lot_demand_per_m2 as double,
		parking_lots_per_m2 as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SatBuildingDetails
LinkBuildingDetails, SatBuildingDetails lookup(LinkBuildingDetails@Building_sqnr == SatBuildingDetails@Building_sqnr
	&& LinkBuildingDetails@Category_sqnr == SatBuildingDetails@Category_sqnr,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupBuildingSqNrCategorySqNr
LookupBuildingSqNrCategorySqNr sink(input(
		Building_sqnr as integer,
		Category_sqnr as integer,
		Construction_cost_m2 as double,
		Demolish_cost_m2 as double,
		Buyout_cost_m2 as double,
		Sell_price as double,
		Parking_lot_demand_per_m2 as double,
		Parking_lots_per_m2 as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Building_sqnr = LinkBuildingDetails@Building_sqnr,
		Category_sqnr = LinkBuildingDetails@Category_sqnr,
		Construction_cost_m2,
		Demolish_cost_m2,
		Buyout_cost_m2,
		Sell_price = Sell_price_m2,
		Parking_lot_demand_per_m2,
		Parking_lots_per_m2 = parking_lots_per_m2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkBuildingFact
